label: ProductHandlingProcess
comment: A naturally occurring or designed sequence of operations or events that create, transform, or touch a product, such as manufacturing, treating, packaging, and storing.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying the type of product handling process.

objectProperties.comment: A process characteristic applicable to this process certificate.
The specified period of completion for this product handling process.
The trade country where the operation of this product handling process occurs.
A trade party who is an operator of this product handling process.

referencedBy.comment: A product handling process applied to this supply chain trade line item, such as manufacturing, treatment or storage.
A product handling process applied to this supply chain trade line item, such as manufacturing, treatment or storage.
